application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The applicant has failed to demonstrate, with the submission of details, that appropriate runoff storage, rainwater harvesting, soakaways maintenance, flood risk mitigation would be implemented in accordance with the National Planning Policy Framework, Policies SI7, SI12, and SI13 of the London Plan (2021), and EM6 of Hillingdon Council's Local Plan: Part 1 - Strategic Policies (2012).
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Condition 7 (Drainage) of planning permission Ref: 27256/APP/2017/3721 dated 13/04/2021 for 'Alterations and conversion of the Manor Lodge into 2 No. 4-bedroom houses; conversion of the Stable Building into 6 No. 1-bedroom and 2 No. 2-bedroom cottages; conversion of the Office Barn into 1 No. studio flat, 1 No. 1-bedroom flat, 2 No. 2-bedroom houses and 1 No. 3-bedroom house; retention of the Granary Building and conversion to garden store; upgrade of boundary treatments; reinstatement of yard pond, together with associated parking and landscaping'.
